items.sentence: What chance does Tom have of actually winning?
There\'s a chance that I can be there by 2:30.
This is my first time to go anywhere by plane.
This is probably not a good time to visit Tom.
Do you know how much Tom gets paid to do that?
Tom realizes Mary doesn\'t like him very much.
Tom has been in the hospital for a few months.
Tom has contributed a lot of money to charity.
Tom has little chance of winning the election.
Don\'t you have someplace else you need to be?
